mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT SUM(FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT, -- 已分配客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT, -- 同意合作客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT, -- 确认合作客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT, -- 执行合作客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT -- 产单客户数 FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_COMPANY WHERE 1=1
)S

SELECT FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT, FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT, FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT, FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT, FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT, -- convert(FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT/FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT*100,decimal(18,2)) AS FUNNEL_WILL_PER, convert(FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT/FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT*100,decimal(18,2)) AS FUNNEL_AGREE_PER, convert(FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT/FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT*100,decimal(18,2)) AS FUNNEL_AFFIRM_PER, convert(FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT/FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT*100,decimal(18,2)) AS FUNNEL_EXECUTE_PER, convert(FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT/FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT*100,decimal(18,2)) AS FUNNEL_PRODUCE_PER, -- FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT AS FUNNEL_WILL_WANT, FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT AS FUNNEL_WILL_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT-FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT AS FUNNEL_WILL_LOST, -- FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT AS FUNNEL_AGREE_WANT, FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_AGREE_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT-FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT AS FUNNEL_AGREE_LOST, -- FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_AFFIRM_WANT, FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT AS FUNNEL_AFFIRM_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT-FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_AFFIRM_LOST, -- FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT AS FUNNEL_EXECUTE_WANT, FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_EXECUTE_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT-FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT AS FUNNEL_EXECUTE_LOST, -- FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_PRODUCE_WANT, FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_PRODUCE_SUCCESS, FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT-FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT AS FUNNEL_PRODUCE_LOST FROM( SELECT SUM(FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_WILL_COUNT, -- 已分配客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_AGREE_COUNT, -- 同意合作客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_AFFIRM_COUNT, -- 确认合作客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_EXECUTE_COUNT, -- 执行合作客户数 SUM(FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT) AS FUNNEL_PRODUCE_COUNT -- 产单客户数 FROM DM_FACT_FUNNEL_COMPANY WHERE 1=1
)S
